Title: Gazprom, CNPC sign deal for more Russian pipeline gas supplies to China
Description: Gazprom has signed a deal with state-owned China National Petroleum Corporation (CNPC) to supply 10 bn m3 a year of gas from Russiaâ€™s far east to China, adding to an existing long-term supply agreement for gas deliveries through the Power of Siberia 1 (PoS1) pipeline.
